name: Blackout
author: NotAKidoS
description:
Dim screen after set time of sitting still. Should be nice for VR sleeping.

Notable Options:
 Cap FPS while sleeping.
Manual control via BTKUILib
Configurable dimming strength.
changelog:
- Added BTKUILib support.
- Added dimming strength velocity multiplier option.
- Added option to not use Automatic Sleep State.
- Dimming strengh now updates in realtime when configuring.
